translation.en: I am changing the way women's prisons are run.
translation.zh: 我在改变女子监狱的管理方式

translation.en: Strong leadership, dynamic vision, the ability to inspire. I tick every box.
translation.zh: 强大的领导力、积极的思维方式鼓舞能力 我样样具备

translation.en: Weak leaders just get taken advantage of. Not on my watch.
translation.zh: 软弱的领导只会被人占便宜我绝不允许出现这种事

translation.en: Where's my watch?
translation.zh: 我的手表呢？

translation.en: Has anyone seen a watch?
translation.zh: 有人看到我的手表了吗？

translation.en: And the cameras are going to be with us all the time…
translation.zh: 摄像机将一直跟着我们

translation.en: -[inmates] Whoo! -…which will be a little strange at first, I'm sure, for all of us.
translation.zh: 我相信大家一开始会感到有点别扭

translation.en: -Are we gonna be on the telly, miss? -I expect that is the general idea, yes.
translation.zh: -我们会上电视吗 小姐？-我认为是的

translation.en: This pilot scheme to mount a musical,
translation.zh: 作为试点项目此次排演音乐剧《西区故事》

translation.en: West Side Story, no less, is an incredible opportunity.
translation.zh: 无疑是一次千载难逢的好机会

translation.en: -I'm excited, and I'm excited for you. -Is that one of your artsy ideas, miss?
translation.zh: 我很开心 为你们感到开心 你又想搞艺术了 小姐？

translation.en: Too many people think they know who prison inmates are
translation.zh: 太多人自以为了解犯人

translation.en: and what prison life is like, without ever setting foot inside one.
translation.zh: 了解监狱生活即使他们从未踏入过高墙内

translation.en: -Yeah. -Too right.
translation.zh: -是的-说得太对了

translation.en: So, let's put the record straight.
translation.zh: 那就来纠正他们的观念

translation.en: Let's break some misconceptions. Let's smash some stereotypes.
translation.zh: 让我们消除误解 打破偏见

translation.en: Be yourselves. You've got nothing to hide.
translation.zh: 做你们自己 不用藏着掖着

translation.en: -She has. She's just nicked your watch! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 她做到了 她刚偷了你的手表

translation.en: You are being given the chance to do something truly creative
translation.zh: 你们现在有机会去做一件非常有创造性的事情

translation.en: while challenging yourself and having your voices heard, literally.
translation.zh: 同时还能挑战自己让别人听到你们的声音

translation.en: -[Jean] Can we do Annie? -Just let me finish.
translation.zh: -能演《安妮》吗？-让我说完

translation.en: We've got a surprise director coming in.
translation.zh: 有一位你们想不到的导演要光临

translation.en: The research is out there, the data has spoken,
translation.zh: 有人做过研究 事实胜于雄辩

translation.en: so remember, creativity leads to… [all] rehabilitation.
translation.zh: 所以记住 通过创造力可以实现改造

translation.en: -Thank you. -What about Dirty Dancing?
translation.zh: -谢谢大家-那《辣身舞》呢？

translation.en: -Hamilton! -I like Phantom.
translation.zh: -《汉密尔顿》！-我喜欢《歌剧魅影》

translation.en: -The King and I. -What about Mary Poppins?
translation.zh: -《国王与我》-《欢乐满人间》如何？

translation.en: -Dreamgirls! -Okay.
translation.zh: 《追梦女郎》！

translation.en: Not up for discussion, we're doing West Side Story,
translation.zh: 这个没得商量 就要演《西区故事》

translation.en: so get your names down and start singing! Thank you.
translation.zh: 所以快点报名 开始排练！谢谢

translation.en: -Do you fancy the cameraman, miss? -[inmate] Oh!
translation.zh: 你喜欢摄像师吗 小姐？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不喜欢

translation.en: Can someone get my watch back, please?
translation.zh: 找人把我的手表弄回来

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -Well, it don't look clean! -[chattering]
translation.zh: 看着就不干净！

translation.en: -Someone's getting their hair did. -[inmate] Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: -有人在做头发-是的 我知道

translation.en: What have I told you about laying those edges though, boo?
translation.zh: 关于用啫喱打理碎发我是怎么说的 亲爱的？

translation.en: You're not allowed no more. Twitter said so.
translation.zh: 推特上说了 你不能再那么做

translation.en: She can do it.
translation.zh: 她可以做

translation.en: So can she.
translation.zh: 她也可以

translation.en: She probably could, but it'd look ridiculous.
translation.zh: 她也许可以 但看上去会很可笑

translation.en: This one definitely can't. You had that?
translation.zh: 她绝对不行 明白吗？

translation.en: Pretend Parker Bowles, that's a look-a-likey.
translation.zh: 冒牌帕克鲍尔斯 她们长得很像

translation.en: Serial shoplifter. Couldn't make it up.
translation.zh: 连环商店扒手 简直不可理喻

translation.en: She's an absolute beast.
translation.zh: 屡教不改

translation.en: You can't be doing that either, boos. That is cultural appropriation.
translation.zh: 精灵们 你们也不能那样做这属于文化剽窃

translation.en: We got bored.
translation.zh: 我们很无聊

translation.en: Well, tell that to the court of public opinion.
translation.zh: 去跟舆论法庭说

translation.en: If Adele can't do it, I don't see how you can.
translation.zh: 如果阿黛尔不能那么做 你们更不行了

translation.en: Elizabeth Fry, the great prison reformer, once said,
translation.zh: 伟大的监狱改革家伊丽莎白弗莱曾经说过

translation.en: "It is an honor to be on the side of the afflicted."
translation.zh: “跟受难之人同列是种荣幸” （劳拉）

translation.en: I say, "Hear, hear."
translation.zh: 我深表赞同

translation.en: Except the murderers.
translation.zh: 但杀人犯除外

translation.en: And the pedophiles.
translation.zh: 还有恋童癖

translation.en: Most sex offenders.
translation.zh: 大部分性犯罪者

translation.en: All sex offenders.
translation.zh: 是所有的性犯罪者

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: all the others, I'm right behind.
translation.zh: 我支持所有其他犯人

translation.en: [Vicki] Put it down there.
translation.zh: 放在那

translation.en: Name?
translation.zh: 名字？

translation.en: Angela Brookes.
translation.zh: 安吉拉布鲁克斯

translation.en: Sign and date there for your belongings.
translation.zh: 这是你的个人物品清单签名并写上日期

translation.en: Is this your first time in prison, Angela?
translation.zh: 你是第一次入狱 安吉拉？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Well, you'll settle in.
translation.zh: 你会习惯的

translation.en: Right, come on. This way.
translation.zh: 好 来吧 这边

translation.en: Did I set out to be governor of a women's prison? I did not.
translation.zh: （犯人必须有人陪同） 我一开始就想当女子监狱的监狱长吗？不是的

translation.en: Was this the tier-one dream? No.
translation.zh: 它是我的首选梦想吗？不是的

translation.en: Was it the tier-two dream? Barely.
translation.zh: 属于次选梦想吗？勉强算

translation.en: But I'm not the kinda person who walks away from a challenge,
translation.zh: 但我不是那种逃避挑战的人

translation.en: and when one's head is hunted,
translation.zh: 一旦被点了名

translation.en: one sticks it firmly on the pike and marches into battle.
translation.zh: 我就会握紧长矛 走向战斗

translation.en: I was headhunted from my previous job.
translation.zh: 我是被挖走的

translation.en: -In events. -Yes.
translation.zh: -参加活动的时候-是的

translation.en: -Thank you, Dean. That's Dean. -I'm her number two.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 迪恩 他叫迪恩-我是她的二把手

translation.en: -Not that I need one. -You don't need a number two?
translation.zh: -其实我不需要-你不需要二把手？

translation.en: I've never needed a number two.
translation.zh: 我从来就不需要“二号”

translation.en: Laura came through the back door of nepotism
translation.zh: 劳拉是走后门进来的

translation.en: and got promoted through over confidence.
translation.zh: 因为过度自信得到提拔 （迪恩）

translation.en: Governor of the prison? We know what this is.
translation.zh: 监狱长？我们都知道是怎么回事

translation.en: Positive discrimination.
translation.zh: 所谓的积极区别对待嘛

translation.en: She got the job just 'cause she's a woman,
translation.zh: 她得到这份工作就因为她是女人

translation.en: and I'm now spending my days trying to get her to say "number two" on camera.
translation.zh: 我这几天在想法设法让她当着镜头说出“二号”

translation.en: It's a small victory for overqualified men in the workplace everywhere.
translation.zh: 对职场上被大材小用的男人来说这是个小小的胜利

translation.en: You all right? I can see what's happened here.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？我火眼金睛

translation.en: What's happened here?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: -What, my bump? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -怎么 我的大肚子？-是的

translation.en: -Pregnancy, innit? -Pregnancy and in jail?
translation.zh: -怀孕了 你看不出来？-怀孕了还坐牢？

translation.en: Parents must be proud.
translation.zh: 你父母一定很骄傲

translation.en: What is it today?
translation.zh: 今天有什么吃的？

translation.en: Shit. Why don't we never have tacos?
translation.zh: 见鬼 我们怎么从来没有过玉米饼？

translation.en: [No Hat Cathy] Tacos and tacos. Tacos and tacos.
translation.zh: 玉米饼

translation.en: -First day? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -第一天来？-是的

translation.en: Do I need to know how many days?
translation.zh: 能告诉我要多少天吗？

translation.en: Do you just sit up in bed all night and compile loads of questions--
translation.zh: 你是不是在床上坐了一个晚上准备了一大堆问题…

translation.en: For goodness sake, Doug! Every time!
translation.zh: 老天爷 道格！每次都这样！

translation.en: Laura, you really need to make a decision.
translation.zh: 劳拉 你必须做出决定了

translation.en: Yes, I know. Plumbing. General maintenance, etcetera, etcetera.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道 管道、日常维护等等

translation.en: -Thank you, Douglas. -It's important.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 道格拉斯-这很重要

translation.en: I spy with my little eye something beginning with "new inmate."
translation.zh: 我是小间谍 好像看到了“新犯人”

translation.en: First timer?
translation.zh: 第一次入狱？

translation.en: Probably not.
translation.zh: 可能不是的

translation.en: I'm Laura Willis. I'm the governor.
translation.zh: 我是监狱长劳拉威利斯

translation.en: And I want you to know, your crime is of no importance to me.
translation.zh: 我想让你知道你犯过什么罪对我并不重要

translation.en: -Good. Because I'm not-- -I don't need to know.
translation.zh: -很好 我不是…-我不需要知道

translation.en: -Well, look, I think you should-- -Ah, ah, ah.
translation.zh: 听着 你应该…

translation.en: -I am not judging you on your worst day. -I'm not an inmate.
translation.zh: -我不会在你最糟糕的日子里评判你-我不是犯人

translation.en: Well, you are.
translation.zh: 你就是

translation.en: But you start afresh right here, right now. The slate is clean.
translation.zh: 但从此刻起 你将重新开始 从头来过

translation.en: I'm Cheryl Fergison.
translation.zh: 我是谢丽尔费吉森

translation.en: That's the spirit, Cheryl Fergison. Welcome.
translation.zh: 要的就是这种精神谢丽尔费吉森 欢迎你

translation.en: You're Cheryl Fergison.
translation.zh: 你是谢丽尔费吉森

translation.en: That's exactly who you are.
translation.zh: 就是你没错

translation.en: Ex-soap star, not a prisoner.
translation.zh: 过气的肥皂剧明星 不是犯人

translation.en: Well, a prisoner of your own talents. I'm so sorry I didn't recognize you.
translation.zh: 不过你是自己天赋的囚徒很抱歉我没认出来

translation.en: -You look nothing like your photo. -What? This photo?
translation.zh: -你跟照片一点都不像-怎么？这张吗？

translation.en: Is that you?
translation.zh: 那是你吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Wowza.
translation.zh: 哇塞

translation.en: So, West Side Story. Very exciting.
translation.zh: 《西区故事》 多令人期待

translation.en: Let me know if you need anything from me, but I don't think you'll have any problem.
translation.zh: 有需要就告诉我但我觉得你不会有任何问题

translation.en: -What do you mean? -You know, just fitting in.
translation.zh: -什么意思？-在融入环境方面

translation.en: You know, all this.
translation.zh: 你的形象

translation.en: This will all be… [whispers] beneficial.
translation.zh: 会大有帮助

translation.en: -Why? -'Cause just…
translation.zh: -这话怎么说？-因为 就是…

translation.en: Everything works.
translation.zh: 一切都那么贴切

translation.en: This your guard? Do you want a bigger one?
translation.zh: 她是陪同你的看守？想换个更壮的吗？

translation.en: Do you even need one?
translation.zh: 你应该都用不着看守

translation.en: I mean, well, she's here now, so…
translation.zh: 既然她在这 所以…

translation.en: Go on, off you go. Drum up some business!
translation.zh: 去吧 挽起袖子干起来

translation.en: Good luck! You won't need it.
translation.zh: 祝你好运！但你不需要

translation.en: See you, Cheryl. I meant to say, I'm a big fan.
translation.zh: 再见 谢丽尔 我本想说我是你的忠实粉丝

translation.en: I'm Dean, by the way. Laura's number two.
translation.zh: 对了 我叫迪恩 劳拉的二把手

translation.en: Wasn't my choice!
translation.zh: 我没得选！

translation.en: To keep the prison board happy, I was forced to have a number two.
translation.zh: 为了让监狱委员会开心我只能配个二把手

translation.en: Musicals? In prison? Hell to the yes.
translation.zh: 音乐剧？监狱里？当然可行

translation.en: No creativity, no rehabilitation.
translation.zh: 没有创造力 何谈改造

translation.en: Which, incidentally, is the upcoming subject of my TED talk.
translation.zh: 这正好是我不久之后演讲的主题

translation.en: What's that called again?
translation.zh: 叫什么名字来着？

translation.en: "I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings:
translation.zh: “《我知道笼中鸟为何歌唱：

translation.en: How Women in Prison Thrive through Music and Song."
translation.zh: 音乐和歌曲如何成就监狱中的女性》”

translation.en: -When's that happening then? -No date set.
translation.zh: -你什么时候上台？-还没确定

translation.en: -So, never. -It's upcoming.
translation.zh: -那就是说没戏-很快就会安排

translation.en: Anyway, that is why I've asked Cheryl Fergison,
translation.zh: 总之 这就是我请谢丽尔费吉森

translation.en: aka Ms. Heather Trott, to come and direct West Side Story.
translation.zh: 也就是希瑟特洛特女士前来执导《西区故事》的原因

translation.en: -Not an obvious choice. -Not her first rodeo.
translation.zh: -不是个好选择-这不是她的第一次了

translation.en: As it turns out, Cheryl has lots of experience working with prisoners
translation.zh: 事实证明 在教犯人演戏方面

translation.en: doing drama workshops and whatnot.
translation.zh: 谢丽尔有着丰富的经验

translation.en: When does she have time for all her rodeos?
translation.zh: 她什么时候有时间教演戏？

translation.en: She's also a well-loved face from stage and screen,
translation.zh: 同时她在舞台和屏幕上深受观众的喜爱

translation.en: which everyone will be excited about.
translation.zh: 大家都会很高兴看到她

translation.en: Big shout going out to the EastEnders massive.
translation.zh: 为《东区人》大声喝彩

translation.en: I've never seen it. It's a popular soap opera about Cockneys.
translation.zh: 我没看过 那是一部讲述伦敦东区佬的热门肥皂剧

translation.en: Yes, I was on EastEnders,
translation.zh: 没错 我在《东区人》有过演出…

translation.en: which does make you very recognizable.
translation.zh: （谢丽尔） …那部剧确实能让你出名

translation.en: But people move on, as have I, as have the audience.
translation.zh: 但人总要继续向前看我已然如此 观众们也是

translation.en: The public see me as a versatile actress
translation.zh: 大家把我看成是一位多才多艺的女演员

translation.en: rather than a character I once played on a soap.
translation.zh: 而不是曾经在一部肥皂剧中出演过的角色

translation.en: All right, Heather? Thought you were dead.
translation.zh: 你是希瑟？我还以为你死了

translation.en: I'm Gary, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 我叫加利

translation.en: Soap royalty.
translation.zh: 肥皂剧界的女王

translation.en: Calm down, Gary. She's only human.
translation.zh: 冷静点 加利 她只是个普通人

translation.en: I'll be all right in a minute.
translation.zh: 我马上就能恢复平静

translation.en: It's just a great day.
translation.zh: 我今天太开心了

translation.en: [Marco] What do you like most about Cheryl, Gaz?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢谢丽尔哪一点 加利？

translation.en: The way she just floats through the scenes.
translation.zh: 她的表演浑然天成

translation.en: She floats convincingly, don't she?
translation.zh: 令人信服 不是吗？

translation.en: The nature of her floating is authentic.
translation.zh: 她的表演惟妙惟肖

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: And EastEnders needed her at that time as well, because…
translation.zh: 《东区人》当时也需要她 因为…

translation.en: Big time.
translation.zh: 非常需要

translation.en: -Saved it. -Saved it.
translation.zh: -她拯救了那部剧-她拯救了那部剧

translation.en: -Saved it. -Saved it.
translation.zh: -拯救了那部剧-拯救了那部剧

translation.en: Do you know the most important factor in not reoffending?
translation.zh: 你知道要制止重新犯罪最重要的因素是什么吗？

translation.en: Stable home life.
translation.zh: 安定的家庭生活

translation.en: Is it? Do you know the other most important factor?
translation.zh: 是吗？那你知道另一个最重要的因素吗？

translation.en: -Regular employment? -Shall I tell you?
translation.zh: -固定的工作？-要我告诉你吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Creativity.
translation.zh: -当然了-创造力

translation.en: -This about your little musical project? -Creativity,
translation.zh: -是关于你那个小音乐剧项目？-创造力

translation.en: a sense of purpose, self-esteem.
translation.zh: 使命感、自尊

translation.en: And my "little musical project"--
translation.zh: 我的“小音乐剧项目”

translation.en: government-funded scheme soon to be rolled out nationally--
translation.zh: 由政府出资 很快就会在全国推广

translation.en: is a step in the right direction.
translation.zh: 是迈向正确方向的一步

translation.en: And if I know these women,
translation.zh: 如果我没猜错

translation.en: they will run towards this opportunity and leap into its arms.
translation.zh: 这些女人会奔向这次机会扑入它的怀抱

translation.en: -All right, ladies. How are we doing? -[cheering]
translation.zh: 好了 女士们 你们好吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: Oh, my God! I'm so excited!
translation.zh: 我的天！我太激动了！

translation.en: It's fantastic to be here. Who's up for a bit of West Side Story?
translation.zh: 我很高兴能来到这里谁准备好了来参演《西区故事》？

translation.en: -Me! -It's a story of two rival gangs,
translation.zh: -我！-它讲述了两个敌对帮派的故事

translation.en: -so some of you might enjoy that aspect. -You know who you are, boos.
translation.zh: -有些人可能会喜欢-你们知道自己是谁 精灵们

translation.en: There'll be proper rehearsals, we'll bring in an orchestra.
translation.zh: 会有几次适当的排练我们还会带管弦乐队来

translation.en: And at the end, we'll put on a banging show
translation.zh: 最后 我们要奉献一场精彩的演出

translation.en: that your friends and family can come and see.
translation.zh: 你们的亲戚朋友都可以来看

translation.en: This one's killed all hers.
translation.zh: 她把亲戚朋友都杀光了

translation.en: Right! Well, as you may or may not know, my name is--
translation.zh: 好吧！不管你们知不知道 我叫…

translation.en: -Heather Trott! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 希瑟特洛特！

translation.en: It's Cheryl Fergison.
translation.zh: 我叫谢丽尔费吉森

translation.en: Get outta my pub!
translation.zh: 滚出我的酒吧！

translation.en: -Thought you was dead, Heather. -Who killed you, again?
translation.zh: -还以为你死了 希瑟-谁杀了你来着？

translation.en: -So, a little bit about me. -You're Heather Trott!
translation.zh: -我先介绍一下自己-你是希瑟特洛特！

translation.en: Trott, Trott, Trott, Trott, Trotter!
translation.zh: 特洛特！

translation.en: Are you finished?
translation.zh: 你们闹完了吗？

translation.en: -[laughter] -I think they're finished now, boo.
translation.zh: 现在可能闹完了 亲爱的

translation.en: Sorry, I'm a bit confused.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我有点糊涂了

translation.en: I've given up my time to do something nice for you,
translation.zh: 我拿出自己的时间来帮你们

translation.en: and it appears that you're treating me like a bit of a mug.
translation.zh: 结果你们把我当傻瓜

translation.en: So, don't do that, 'cause I'm not.
translation.zh: 别那样做 因为我不是傻瓜

translation.en: And here's the dealio.
translation.zh: 现在是这样

translation.en: Join in, don't join in, makes no odds to me.
translation.zh: 你们参不参加 对我来说没关系

translation.en: Just remember a couple of things. One, don't be a cunt. And two, that's it.
translation.zh: 但要记住两件事第一 别犯贱 第二 参见第一条

translation.en: Mike drop.
translation.zh: 掷地有声

translation.en: Well, I do, Dean. I reject the whole concept.
translation.zh: 我确实介意 迪恩 我拒绝接受这个想法

translation.en: -Of having a number two? -I see it as a form of weakness.
translation.zh: -你不需要二把手？-我认为这是懦弱的表示

translation.en: As governor of this prison, the last thing I need people to see
translation.zh: 作为本监狱的监狱长我最不希望别人看到的

translation.en: is an insipid little number two trailing behind me.
translation.zh: 就是有个无趣的二把手跟在我后面

translation.en: If you've finished, could we please have a conversation about--
translation.zh: 要是你们说完了 我们能聊聊…

translation.en: Plumbing? Plumbing?
translation.zh: 管道的事？

translation.en: Well, it's actually quite serious, so if--
translation.zh: 问题其实挺严重 所以如果…

translation.en: Hello? Oh. I'm sorry, Doug, I'm gonna have to take this.
translation.zh: 喂？抱歉 道格 我得接个电话

translation.en: Oh, Doug. I'm only joking.
translation.zh: 道格 我开玩笑的

translation.en: Doug and I basically want the same thing. We want to improve this prison.
translation.zh: 道格和我的追求基本一致我们都想改善这座监狱

translation.en: Now, Doug's interpretation of that is something about fixing the plumbing,
translation.zh: 道格认为这意味着要维修管道

translation.en: whereas I focus more on artistic endeavor,
translation.zh: 而我更关注艺术创作

translation.en: and let's be honest, what's more important in the day-to-day life of an inmate?
translation.zh: 实话实说 对犯人的日常生活来说哪一样更重要呢？

translation.en: [Doug] Could it be plumbing?
translation.zh: 应该是管道吧？

translation.en: So, with that in mind, I have invested in personalized… [exaggerated Italian accent] librettos.
translation.zh: 有鉴于此我在特制唱词本上投入了大量资金

translation.en: Hand printed on cream parchment
translation.zh: 用薄羊皮纸手写出了

translation.en: for every member of the West Side Story cast.
translation.zh: 《西区故事》每一位演员的唱词

translation.en: Government funding didn't quite stretch to that,
translation.zh: 政府的资助没包括这一块

translation.en: so what's a gal to do?
translation.zh: 作为女人 我能怎么办？

translation.en: She finds it somewhere else!
translation.zh: 只能自己另想办法！

translation.en: What's a libretto?
translation.zh: 什么是唱词？

translation.en: A… [exaggerated accent] libretto is the extended text of a vocal work.
translation.zh: 唱词就是声乐作品延申出来的文字

translation.en: -Do you mean the words to the songs? -Expensive? Yes.
translation.zh: 你是说歌词吗？ 贵吗？当然贵 值吗？很值

translation.en: Worth it? Most definitely.
translation.zh: 贵吗？当然贵 值吗？很值

translation.en: -What else are prison budgets for? -Plumbing.
translation.zh: -监狱预算还能用来干吗？-修管道

translation.en: -What could improve their lives more? -Plumbing.
translation.zh: -哪样能让她们的生活更美好？-修管道

translation.en: Do you know how many other women's prisons have invested in handbound librettos
translation.zh: 这种手工装订唱词本属于20世纪最伟大的音乐剧

translation.en: of the greatest musical of the 20th century?
translation.zh: 其他女子监狱有几个这么干的？

translation.en: -None? -None.
translation.zh: -没有一个？-没有一个

translation.en: I like Laura, I do, but, uh, she doesn't make it easy, though.
translation.zh: 我喜欢劳拉 真的 但她不好打交道

translation.en: She rarely listens, she won't take advice.
translation.zh: （道格） 她很少倾听别人 不肯接受建议

translation.en: I think she's quite forgetful, and if there's a problem…
translation.zh: 好像还很健忘 如果有问题…

translation.en: -[Laura] If I want an idiot… -…she's usually the cause of it.
translation.zh: -如果你想要个蠢货…-…通常都是她造成的

translation.en: Last year the electrics needed rewiring.
translation.zh: 去年电路系统需要重新布线

translation.en: Instead she chose to install nature walls
translation.zh: 但她却选择安装大自然主题墙面

translation.en: to promote a sense of calm and improve vibes generally.
translation.zh: 来培养平和的心态 改善总体环境

translation.en: -Oh, you fuck off! Yeah, yeah… -[indistinct] You fuck off!
translation.zh: 你他妈滚！来 来啊…

translation.en: Didn't work. But you just can't help liking her.
translation.zh: 虽然没用 但你还是会忍不住喜欢她

translation.en: -Oh, sorry to disturb you. Good moment? -[Jean] All right.
translation.zh: 抱歉打搅 你现在方便吗？

translation.en: -Um, do you like dancing and stuff? -No, not really.
translation.zh: -你喜欢跳舞什么的吗？-不太喜欢

translation.en: Oh, you don't like dancing. What about singing?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢跳舞 那唱歌呢？

translation.en: -No. -Well, can I put you down for costumes?
translation.zh: -不喜欢-给你报名管服装行吗？

translation.en: -In what? -Do you want to be in a musical?
translation.zh: -报什么名？-你想参加音乐剧演出吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Great. Okay.
translation.zh: -想-那就好

translation.en: Okay. I'll put you down then, yeah?
translation.zh: 好 那我就给你报名了

translation.en: -All right, cheers then. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好的 谢谢-谢谢你

translation.en: Ladies, we're doing a musical.
translation.zh: 女士们 我们要演音乐剧

translation.en: I was wondering if I could put you down for something?
translation.zh: 能给你们安排点事吗？

translation.en: Some singing, some dancing, some-- Any--
translation.zh: 唱歌、跳舞 还有…任何…

translation.en: [harmonizing] ♪ Some people can hold it together ♪
translation.zh: 有人能不离不弃

translation.en: ♪ Last through all kinds of weather ♪
translation.zh: 经历风风雨雨

translation.en: ♪ Can we? ♪
translation.zh: 我们是否可以？

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: [Sal] What are we?
translation.zh: 我们的口号是？

translation.en: Gay for the stay.
translation.zh: 坐一天牢 当一天同性恋

translation.en: I mean, it's not for everyone, late onset lesbianism.
translation.zh: （卡尔 萨尔） 晚发型女同性恋并不适合所有人

translation.en: But my goodness, we're giving it a go.
translation.zh: 但我很庆幸我们尝试了

translation.en: So, uh, are you up for it?
translation.zh: 你愿意加入吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -What about you, my love?
translation.zh: -愿意-你呢 亲爱的？

translation.en: I've heard I'll get out of a load of shit stuff if I do it,
translation.zh: 我听说参加的话 能省掉很多麻烦事

translation.en: so I might as well.
translation.zh: 所以也算我一个

translation.en: Unless it's shit. And then I'll stop.
translation.zh: 除非这事很操蛋 那我就退出

translation.en: Oh, right. That's the spirit. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对 要的就是这种精神

translation.en: West Side Story? That sounds boring,
translation.zh: 《西区故事》？听着就没劲

translation.en: like all her ideas.
translation.zh: 她的想法全那样

translation.en: Boring, pointless, badly executed, benefiting no one.
translation.zh: （查丽） 无聊、无意义、执行不力、无人受益

translation.en: So these are my choices:
translation.zh: 我的选择如下

translation.en: singing olde worlde songs about Sharks and Jet Skis or something,
translation.zh: 用刻意复古的英语演唱关于鲨鱼帮和摩托艇帮的歌曲

translation.en: or finishing my boring parenting course for a baby I don't even want.
translation.zh: 或者为了一个我都不想要的孩子完成无聊的亲子课

translation.en: There's not much in it, really.
translation.zh: 说真的 区别不大

translation.en: [Cheryl] All right, what about you then? You tempted?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你呢？有兴趣吗？

translation.en: It's something to do for the next six weeks, innit?
translation.zh: 接下来的六周都有事可做 不是吗？

translation.en: Oh, gosh, no, no, I'm not cut out for that sort of thing.
translation.zh: 天哪 不 我不是那块料

translation.en: Um, also, I'm just in on remand. Just waiting for my trial date.
translation.zh: 而且我只是还押候审 在等着开庭

translation.en: My lawyer says I won't be in here that long, anyway.
translation.zh: 我的律师说了 我不会在这里待那么久

translation.en: I don't see how I can be, because I didn't do it.
translation.zh: 我也觉得不太可能 因为我没犯法

translation.en: [Jean] We all didn't do it, love!
translation.zh: 我们都没犯法 亲爱的！

translation.en: No, but I re-- I really didn't do it.
translation.zh: 不 我是真的没犯法

translation.en: Well, if your trial turns into a sentence, you know where to find me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 要是你庭审后被判了刑你知道去哪找我

translation.en: Hey there, Cheryl!
translation.zh: 我听说演出的事了！

translation.en: I want be a part of that. Put me on the list. My name's Sian.
translation.zh: 我要参加 给我报上名 我叫希安

translation.en: Bit weird in here, innit?
translation.zh: 这人有点怪异 是不是？

translation.en: We don't say, "weird."
translation.zh: 我们不会说“怪异”

translation.en: We say, "Welsh."
translation.zh: 我们说“奇特”

translation.en: Sian is from Wales.
translation.zh: 希安来自威尔士

translation.en: That beautiful country that borders England to the west.
translation.zh: 是那个在西面与英格兰接壤的美丽国家

translation.en: Not the mammal.
translation.zh: 不是“鲸鱼”那个词

translation.en: She speaks with the rich melody of her motherland.
translation.zh: 她说话带着故国那种丰富的旋律

translation.en: It's just a shame no one knows what she's saying.
translation.zh: 可惜的是没人知道她在说什么

translation.en: So, when she requested full traditional costume
translation.zh: 所以当她为了贴近自己的凯尔特传统

translation.en: to feel closer to her Celtic heritage, I was happy to oblige.
translation.zh: 向我索要全套传统服饰时我很高兴地答应了

translation.en: At least, I think that's what she asked for.
translation.zh: 至少我认为她要的是那个

translation.en: [thick Welsh accent] Only went to ask for a hypoallergenic pillow.
translation.zh: 我只是想要一个防过敏枕头

translation.en: And she gave me this.
translation.zh: 她却给了我这套衣服

translation.en: I'm still all bunged up.
translation.zh: 我的鼻子还是不通气

translation.en: -Is it ice cream? -Yeah, but it's shit.
translation.zh: -那是冰淇淋吗？-是的 但很差劲

translation.en: Why can't we ever have Cornettos?
translation.zh: 为什么从来不给我们可爱多？

translation.en: [inmates] ♪ Just one Cornetto, give it to me ♪
translation.zh: 我只要一个可爱多 给我吧

translation.en: -Why are you not joining in the singing? -Um…
translation.zh: -香甜可口的冰淇淋 来自意大利…-你怎么不一起唱？

translation.en: -What have you got against Cornettos? -Nothing, I just don't know the words.
translation.zh: -你对可爱多有什么意见？-没意见 我只是不知道歌词

translation.en: -Oh, that's convenient. -What?
translation.zh: -这可省事了-什么？

translation.en: -Why are you shouting? -I'm not, I--
translation.zh: -你嚷嚷什么？-我没有 我…

translation.en: Be careful.
translation.zh: 小心点

translation.en: Heather!
translation.zh: 希瑟！

translation.en: Heather!
translation.zh: 希瑟！

translation.en: Is there going to be an audience for your show, Heather?
translation.zh: 会有观众看演出吗 希瑟？

translation.en: Is there going to be people watching at the end, like?
translation.zh: 最后会有人看吗？

translation.en: Because if there is, I'll be in it, and me mammy will come see it.
translation.zh: 如果有的话 那我也参加我妈妈会来观看的

translation.en: This one's for my mammy.
translation.zh: 这是为我妈妈纹的

translation.en: That's why it says "Mammy". Are you watching that one on your camera?
translation.zh: 所以纹的是“妈妈”两个字镜头对准这个了吗？

translation.en: Like.
translation.zh: 这样

translation.en: That one. I've got loads of 'em.
translation.zh: （萝丝） 这是一个 我身上有很多

translation.en: I get-- I get them when I'm happy. I get them when I'm sad.
translation.zh: 我高兴了纹 不高兴了也纹

translation.en: When they locked my mammy up for the first time,
translation.zh: 我妈妈第一次被关进监狱时

translation.en: I couldn't cry, I was too numb.
translation.zh: 我哭不出来 我太麻木了

translation.en: So, I got that one.
translation.zh: 所以就纹了这个

translation.en: And the pain of the needle was so bad
translation.zh: 针头刺得我好疼

translation.en: that the tears came and they wouldn't stop.
translation.zh: 我止不住地留下了眼泪

translation.en: They call it a cathartic experience or some shite.
translation.zh: 他们管这个叫“情感宣泄”什么的

translation.en: I think that's all bollocks, I just like having pictures on my arm.
translation.zh: 我认为纯属瞎扯我只是喜欢胳膊上有图案

translation.en: That's the one I got. There.
translation.zh: 这是我纹的那个 看这里

translation.en: Birds.
translation.zh: 是鸟

translation.en: That was supposed to be me, but it didn't turn out right.
translation.zh: 这个应该是我 但不太像

translation.en: Will I do a tattoo on you?
translation.zh: 我能不能给你做个纹身？

translation.en: I'll get my needle.
translation.zh: 我去拿我的针

translation.en: You've got none on your arm.
translation.zh: 你胳膊上一个都没有

translation.en: That's great. That's just, like, fresh meat.
translation.zh: 太好了 简直像块鲜肉

translation.en: I just go "pew-pew-pew-pew-pew".
translation.zh: 我只要…

translation.en: Pffft… with the blood.
translation.zh: 血就流出来了

translation.en: 'Cause I'm not very good.
translation.zh: 因为我的技术不是很好

translation.en: What's it like being on the TV? Did you like being on the TV?
translation.zh: 上电视是什么感觉？你喜欢上电视吗？

translation.en: Did they call you Heather all the time?
translation.zh: 他们一直叫你希瑟吗？

translation.en: -What is your real name again? -It's Cheryl.
translation.zh: -你的真名是什么来着？-谢丽尔

translation.en: That's nice. I'm Ros. Write that down in your book there.
translation.zh: 真好听 我叫萝丝 写在你那个本上

translation.en: Is it R-O-S or R-O-Z?
translation.zh: 是“斯文”的斯 还是“思想”的思？

translation.en: I don't know, I can't read.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我不识字

translation.en: Yeah, that looks grand.
translation.zh: 看着很棒

translation.en: Heather, it… [groans]
translation.zh: 希瑟 那…

translation.en: Cheryl…
translation.zh: 是谢丽尔…

translation.en: Me girl will be in it and all, but she don't speak, so she can't sing.
translation.zh: 我女朋友也要参加但她不会说话 所以唱不了

translation.en: Cheryl.
translation.zh: 谢丽尔

translation.en: Viv. I'm a natural-born entertainer.
translation.zh: 我叫维芙 是天生的演员

translation.en: I'm also incredibly violent and singing is my happy place.
translation.zh: 同时我也极端暴力 但我一唱歌就开心

translation.en: So look no further.
translation.zh: 所以不用再找人了

translation.en: I do impressions.
translation.zh: 我会模仿

translation.en: Gordon Ramsay, Ellen DeGeneres, Graham Norton,
translation.zh: （大维芙） 戈登拉姆齐、艾伦德杰尼勒斯格拉汉姆诺顿

translation.en: whoever it is does The One Show.
translation.zh: 凡是上过《第一秀》的

translation.en: All the Kardashians, except the old one.
translation.zh: 还有卡戴珊一家 那个上年纪的除外

translation.en: I can do them all. And I can do them all fucking well.
translation.zh: 我都能模仿 而且惟妙惟肖

translation.en: And if anyone says any different, I'll fucking kill 'em.
translation.zh: 要是有人不同意 我就会杀了他们

translation.en: [imitates American accent] I'm excited.
translation.zh: 我很开心

translation.en: [normal voice] That was one of the Kardashians.
translation.zh: 刚才是模仿卡戴珊家的人

translation.en: That was-- That was really good, Viv.
translation.zh: 刚才…模仿得太棒了 维芙

translation.en: -Yeah. -That was brilliant.
translation.zh: -没错-你太有才了

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: So you say… [exaggerated accent] libretto.
translation.zh: 你刚才说“唱词”

translation.en: Out of curiosity, how would you say that?
translation.zh: 我就是好奇 你会怎么读这个词？

translation.en: -"Barthelona." -Barcelona, that's great.
translation.zh: -“爬”塞罗那-巴塞罗那 很好

translation.en: What about this one?
translation.zh: 这个呢？

translation.en: -[exaggerated accent] Cappuccino. -Cappuccino.
translation.zh: -卡布“七”诺-卡布奇诺

translation.en: Okay, and what about…
translation.zh: 好 那…

translation.en: -[exaggerated Punjabi accent] Tarka Dhal. -Sorry, what was that?
translation.zh: -“大哥大”-抱歉 什么？

translation.en: -Tarka Dhal. -Yep, that's what I thought you said.
translation.zh: -“大哥大”-没错 你就是这么念的

translation.en: Hey, I thought it was you. How are you getting on?
translation.zh: 嘿 我就知道是你 进展如何？

translation.en: Yeah, all right. It's been a long day though. I'm going home soon.
translation.zh: 还行 这一天够累的 我马上要回家了

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Back to Albert Square?
translation.zh: 是吗？回阿伯特广场？

translation.en: ♪ Ooh ♪
translation.zh: （下午3点36分第一监区 3号摄像头）

translation.en: I'll be off then.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: You were right. This did come in handy.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我的形象派上了用场

translation.en: Plus, I dropped the c-bomb and they settled down.
translation.zh: 再加上我说了“贱人”这个词她们都老实了

translation.en: Oh, my old trick. I'm glad you stopped by, Cheryl.
translation.zh: 这是我的老办法很高兴你顺路来了一趟 谢丽尔

translation.en: These are for you.
translation.zh: 这是给你的

translation.en: -Oh. What are they? -Handbound on cream parchment,
translation.zh: 是什么？ 手工装订的特制薄羊皮纸唱词本

translation.en: personalized… [exaggerated accent] librettos.
translation.zh: 手工装订的特制薄羊皮纸唱词本

translation.en: What's a libretto?
translation.zh: 什么唱词？

translation.en: Oh. Uh, the words to the songs. They were very expensive.
translation.zh: -是歌词-它们很贵的

translation.en: Uh, right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -They look a bit of a faff. [chuckles] -Ouch.
translation.zh: -貌似是瞎费功夫-哎哟

translation.en: Plus, uh, I got these off the Internet for free,
translation.zh: 还有 我从网上免费下载了这些

translation.en: -so I'll use them if that's all right. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 没问题的话 我就用它们了

translation.en: Hope you kept the receipt for those, uh, lib things.
translation.zh: 但愿这些唱什么的 你还留着发票

translation.en: [exaggerated accent] Librettos.
translation.zh: 唱词本

translation.en: First day over.
translation.zh: 第一天结束了

translation.en: Well, I got through it. I'm still here. [inhales deeply]
translation.zh: 我熬过来了 还在这里 （安吉）

translation.en: I've just got to keep going and pray for justice.
translation.zh: 我只要坚持下去 为正义祈祷就行

translation.en: Tomorrow is a new day…
translation.zh: 明天是全新的一天…

translation.en: …full of promise, so there's no need to lose hope.
translation.zh: 充满希望 所以没必要灰心

translation.en: I've just got to keep strong and have faith.
translation.zh: 我只要保持坚强 胸怀信念

translation.en: And know that everything is gonna be all right in the end.
translation.zh: 相信最后一切都会好起来

translation.en: Because it's like I always say,
translation.zh: 因为就像我一直说的

translation.en: "Never underestimate how good people can be."
translation.zh: “永远不要低估别人的善良”

translation.en: That's going nowhere.
translation.zh: 冲不下去

translation.en: -I can't see where I'm going. -[Pat Pat] Where did the water go?
translation.zh: -我看不见路-怎么没水了？

translation.en: You fucking kidding me with this? Who put the water off?
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？谁把水关了？

translation.en: What's going on, boos?
translation.zh: 出什么事了 精灵们？

translation.en: Oh, no! No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No, Jeanie! Jeanie, cover that up!
translation.zh: 不 珍妮 快挡住

translation.en: -Oh, no, has it gone? -[shouting in distance]
translation.zh: 不 走了吗？

translation.en: Oh, there's more of 'em! No, I'm not paid enough for this!
translation.zh: 人更多了？不给我的薪水不够 我看不下去了

translation.en: There'd better not be any fucking cameras here.
translation.zh: 这里最好别有摄像机

translation.en: -[straw gurgles] -Water main's burst.
translation.zh: 总水管爆了

translation.en: -What? -No water at all
translation.zh: -什么？-在修好之前

translation.en: in the entire prison, until it's fixed, which could take 48 hours.
translation.zh: 整个监狱全没水用可能得用48个小时才能修好

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Well, I did warn you it was gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我警告过你 迟早会有这种事

translation.en: -When? -When we had the conversation
translation.zh: -什么时候？-我告诉你管道

translation.en: where I told you the plumbing needed fixing.
translation.zh: 需要维修的时候

translation.en: They're already kicking off. Let's hope it doesn't escalate.
translation.zh: 犯人已经闹起来了 但愿事态不要升级

translation.en: Do you remember the good old days? When we used to have controlled riots.
translation.zh: 还记得那些美好的日子吗？我们经常让犯人在监管下暴动

translation.en: Yes, because I believe in a safe environment, they have their place.
translation.zh: 记得 因为我相信在安全的环境里 这么做没有问题

translation.en: And, riot!
translation.zh: 开始 暴动！

translation.en: Please be aware of the person closest to you.
translation.zh: 请注意离你最近的人

translation.en: Let's bring that down by about 50%.
translation.zh: 把暴力程度降低一半

translation.en: I wanted them to have all the fun of a riot without the danger.
translation.zh: 我希望她们能在不出危险的情况下享受到暴乱的所有乐趣

translation.en: And how did that work out?
translation.zh: 结果如何呢？

translation.en: It was not at all fun, and it was quite dangerous.
translation.zh: 毫无乐趣 而且相当危险

translation.en: I remember now.
translation.zh: 我现在想起来了

translation.en: Not at all fun, and quite dangerous. Wasn't that your nickname in high school?
translation.zh: 毫无乐趣 而且相当危险这不是你在高中时的外号吗？

translation.en: No, my nickname was Margarine.
translation.zh: 不 我的外号是“人造奶油”

translation.en: -Why? Because your hair was always greasy? -No, because I spread easily.
translation.zh: -怎么？因为你的头发一直油乎乎？-不 因为我很容易上

translation.en: Oh. The librettos have arrived, I see.
translation.zh: “唱字本”都到了

translation.en: -That's money well spent. -It's… [exaggerated accent] libretto!
translation.zh: -钱花得真值-是唱词本！

translation.en: How many fucking times?
translation.zh: 还要我说多少次？

translation.en: And riot!
translation.zh: 开始暴动！

translation.en: She's cut off our water!
translation.zh: 她切断了我们的水！

translation.en: Look at me. I was in there having a shower and the water just stopped.
translation.zh: 看看 我正在里面洗澡 水突然就停了

translation.en: Where's our water, Willis?
translation.zh: 我们的水在哪 威利斯？
